text: @realDonaldTrump Truth: Your Administration mishandled the COVID19 Pandemic and we lost over 100,000 living human beings and counting. Truth: You showed no empathy 4 George Floyd did not support the nation as we all were horrified&mourned.Instead of supporting us, you turned the Guard against us.
